lines.i: Time at which the public safety answering point call center is notified of an emergency

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.38"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11143)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10835)/@code="69469-5" 911 call to public safety answering point or other designated entity requesting EMS services [Date and time] Facility NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10834)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="TS" (CONF:10836)
NEMSIS Trace: ETimes.01
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11143)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10835)/@code="69469-5" 911 call to public safety answering point or other designated entity requesting EMS services [Date and time] Facility NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10834)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="TS" (CONF:10836)
NEMSIS Trace: ETimes.01
